item.title: Seasonality trading with NatGas
item.description: With the benefit of hindsight, I have seen some seasonality patterns in NatGas that seemed to generate decent returns but I haven’t really done any work to test if those patterns held up consistently in the past so I might just be remembering the “good” trades. Intuitively, NatGas rallying during the fourth quarter as demand perks up due to winter season is understandable, which will then be followed up by lower prices as demand normalizes during the non-winter season.
